DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare voucher-based contingency management ( CM ) procedures lower-cost CM system provide opportunity win prize . Cocaine-dependent outpatient randomly assign ( ) standard treatment , ( b ) standard treatment plus usual magnitude prize CM , ( c ) standard treatment plus high magnitude prize CM , ( ) standard treatment plus voucher CM . Urine breath sample collect 2-3x/week 14 week . Follow-up interview conduct 1,3,6 9 month follow intake substance use psychosocial functioning assess .
